title: @fal-works/sagmal JSON Schema for .sagmalrc
description:
JSON schema for .sagmalrc configuration files used by @fal-works/sagmal, a CLI translation tool.
https://github.com/fal-works/sagmal

copyToClipboard.description: Whether to automatically copy translated text to the clipboard.

sourceLang.description:
Default source language code.
Validated by DeepL API, not by this schema.
https://developers.deepl.com/docs/getting-started/supported-languages

targetLang.description:
Default target language code.
Validated by DeepL API, not by this schema.
https://developers.deepl.com/docs/getting-started/supported-languages#translation-source-languages

targetLang2.description:
Secondary default target language code used as a fallback.
Validated by DeepL API, not by this schema.
https://developers.deepl.com/docs/getting-started/supported-languages#translation-source-languages

options.description:
Other DeepL API options (formality, context, modelType, etc.) that are directly passed to the API.
Validated by DeepL API, not by this schema.
https://github.com/deeplcom/deepl-node?tab=readme-ov-file#text-translation-options
